meta.review_title: VODACOM - TOBI ALLOWING SIM-SWOP TO CRIMINALS
meta.review_content:
Vodacom,

I wish to inform you that I am very disappointed in your service.
I've been a loyal Vodacom user since 1998 and recently you just disappoint me.
2 months ago someone tried to do a sim-swop on my number,
I've asked you to ‘flag’ my number incase someone wants to do it again,
Last week I received an sms saying a sim-swop was done on my number, I had to phone you and cancel it, because it was not me,
I was informed that it was done through Tobi.
Yesterday 24.05.2022 it happened to me again,
Ive noticed that I did not have any service – which was very strange,
I contacted Vodacom, and once again I was informed of a sim-swop that was happening, that I did NOT authorised.
Once again Tobi allowed this to happen,
Airtime was transferred from my number, and a few calls was done from my number,
Will you please just cancel this Tobi bot,
It is not working, it’s a FAIL.
What is the hackers got access to my bank accounts.
Would you have refunded me? Because it would be YOUR MISTAKE.
